short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Level the playing field! Use this handy extension to remind you of some important context when reading anything about Rishi Sunak.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This fun, simple context reminder will help counter balance any shrewd, political manipulation being used whenever reading about Rishi Sunak by adding the words 'Multi-millionaire capitalist' before every mention of his name across the most popular news and info sites.
